example.text: Mr. Speaker, this bill is far from perfect; however, the full faith and credit of the United States is at risk, and we cannot let Republicans drive us to default. Defaulting on the national debt would disrupt Social Security benefits for 92,000 households in my congressional district.

Republicans need to take a US default OFF the table & work together to pass a clean debt bill as they did THREE times under Trump. Threatening Americans with a recession or depression is just wrong! [[url]] [[url]]

Our students, teachers & school staff deserve safe, healthy places to learn and work! I’ve introduced an innovative school-repair bill based on an idea that’s worked in Virginia, & VA’s 2 senators have introduced a companion Senate bill: [[url]] #PHLed [[url]]

As #Philadelphia receives another bus of migrants, my office has been working to help – we prepared this resource guide for communities like ours that have been receiving these buses from Southern states: [[url]] [[url]]

Republicans need to take a US default OFF the table & work together to pass a clean debt bill as they did THREE times under Trump. Threatening Americans with a recession or depression is just wrong! [[url]] [[url]]
